import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link, Routes } from "react-router-dom"; import Dashboard from "./dashboard"; export default function LoginBox() { const postCreds = () => { const username = document.getElementById("uName").value; const password = document.getElementById("uPass").value; //implement post function here }; return ( <>


); }
